title: Tech bolsters frontcourt with addition of Mylyjael Poteat - VT hokiesports.com
content: Tech bolsters frontcourt with addition of Mylyjael Poteat  VT hokiesports.com
description: The Virginia Tech men's basketball team continues to add depth to its frontcourt with the addition of Rice transfer, Mylyjael Poteat, as announced by head coach Mike Young on Wednesday afternoon.
